title: Poached salmon steaks with horseradish and chive sauce
ingredients: ['450ml (16fl oz) semi-skimmed milk', '350ml (12fl oz) water', '2 tablespoons lemon juice', '1 small onion, thinly sliced', '1 celery stick with leaves, coarsely chopped', '1 carrot, coarsely chopped', '4 black peppercorns', '4 salmon steaks, about 115g (4oz) each', '1 tablespoon bottled grated horseradish', '115g (4oz) half-fat crème fraîche', '115g (4oz) reduced-fat mayonnaise', '2 tablespoons snipped fresh chives', 'freshly ground black pepper']
